frame.name: Alignment_image_schema
frame.definition: <def-root>An <fen>Alignment_match</fen> region has the same orientation as the relatively linear <fen>Ground</fen>. The <fen>Alignment_mismatch</fen> region is oriented perpendicularly to the <fen>Ground</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Alignment_match
FE.definition: <def-root>A region of space oriented the same as the <fen>Ground</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Ground
FE.definition: <def-root>An entity whose location and orientation is relatively well-known and which, thus, can serve as a land-mark to identify the <fen>Alignment_match</fen> and <fen>Alignment_mismatch</fen> regions.</def-root>

FE.name: Alignment_mismatch
FE.definition: <def-root>A region oriented approximately perpendicular to the <fen>Ground</fen></def-root>
